From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

"I cannot vote for myself? Something is amiss here, I should have 2 votes if
Technosis isn't in." Atma said. He was still away a distance.

"My vote doesn't count?" Technosis asked. She fell over.

"Oh, yeah, I forgot, I'm a nobody." Technosis said. She started to walk
away, tripping every once in a while.

"Listen here asshole, you hurt her feelings, I was trying to make her feel
wanted, she's a nice girl, what kind of bot are you you sicko? I'm leaving
with Atma, we'll go to the cave and you asses are not invited!" Psuedo
yelled. He put a hand on Technosis' should and helped her along. the 3
heading toward the cave on their own. Atma smiling at Psuedo for still being
a good friend...
----- Original Message -----
From: <minime_316@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 13, 2000 9:16 PM
Subject: Re: Goings on


>
> Starscream
> "Hold on a sec! Did you hear the rules Atma? Now voting for yourself
> and i didn't mention Technosis' name in the voting party. You have
> one vote. Us five, you, me, Drillbit, Pseudo and Phobia are voting,
> cause we basically lead. No matter what KitKat says we have to
> relieve her of command. I don't want to, but for the safety of the
> group we have to. My vote for Phobia stands. Pseudo, you vote for
> Atma. Drillbit, Atma, Phobia, whom do you vote for?"
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Brix
>
> Brix gazed at Ramulus.
>
> "You want to put yourself inside Fliq? I don't know. I mean, when
> Fliq and I were in my body, it changed to this. Your spark could
> change Fliq's body, and with the damage who knowd if he could take
> it. But if it's the only way........Alright. He'll die anyway if we
> don't. What do i do?"
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
>
> Vulois' face was struck with happiness.
>
> "Child....this theory could be great. How do you think the angels
> placed this book here? Human history has not been recorded yet. Thery
> barely exist. They must know time travel of some type. If they left
> that secret with the book...who knows what we can do? What if we
> stopped Hell Beast from coming  to the planet? We could end this war,
> before it began? It's already a proven fact that organics were on
> Cybertron. What if we went back and saved them? We could prevent the
> upcoming catastrophe. Sure, there could be conciquences, and before
> we made any decision we would weigh it, but if we could learn it, it
> would make our jobs a whole lot easier!"
>
>
>
>
